task.title: How to fill a piping bag
task.shortdesc: There's a trick to it! Use a glass to hold your piping bag open while you fill it. This makes much less of a mess!

taskbody.context: Once you're ready to start decorating, fill your piping bags with icing.

step.cmd: Open bag and place inside a tall glass, then cuff bag over sides so it holds itself open.
Pour or scrape your icing into the bag.
Close bag by tying a knot, using a bag clip, or using a twistie.
